name: Albertin Jepchumba!
greetingText: Today is the day the world was upgraded 😂
wishText: May your life be as sweet as ugali with blueband, as stable as WiFi during exams (ok maybe not 😅), and full of happiness bigger than teacher Yatich’s English quotes! Enjoy your special day, Jepchumba 🥳
text1: Cieee birthday girl, turning into official CEO of birthdays! 🕺💃
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Wishing you more A’s than Albertin already collects in class 😂🎂
text2: I was going to just text you like normal…
text3: But then I thought, nahhh too boring 😴
text4: So I decided to build you something
text5Content: You’re the type of friend who deserves more than just ‘HBD lol’ 😂
outroText: Hope this made you laugh harder than Yegon’s ‘gari ni yako ama ya babako?’ joke 🤣. Have an amazing day!
replayText: Click here if you want to laugh at this website again 😂
